block.p: Mina Gerowin and Jeffrey Warren Herrmann are to be married today by Rabbi Joel S. Goor at the couple's house in New Rochelle, N.Y.

Ms. Gerowin, 48, will continue to use her name professionally. She is the chairwoman of Mina Findings Inc. and Corseaux Ltd., private investment concerns in New Rochelle. She graduated from Smith College and received a law degree from the University of Virginia, and an M.B.A. from Harvard University. She is a daughter of Frieda H. Gerowin of Boca Raton, Fla., and the late Charles Gerowin.
Mina Gerowin and Jeffrey Warren Herrmann are to be married today by Rabbi Joel S. Goor at the couple's house in New Rochelle, N.Y.

Ms. Gerowin, 48, will continue to use her name professionally. She is the chairwoman of Mina Findings Inc. and Corseaux Ltd., private investment concerns in New Rochelle. She graduated from Smith College and received a law degree from the University of Virginia, and an M.B.A. from Harvard University. She is a daughter of Frieda H. Gerowin of Boca Raton, Fla., and the late Charles Gerowin.

Mr. Herrmann, 54, who works in New York, is a partner in Vedder Price Kaufman & Kammholz, a Chicago law firm. He graduated cum laude from Columbia University, where he also received a master's degree in physics. He received his law degree from Harvard University. He is a son of Marjorie R. Herrmann of Wauwatosa, Wis., and the late Warren E. Herrmann.
The bridegroom's previous marriage ended in divorce.
